original_text: The Levites will also have a special part, south of the part for the priests. It will be the same size. It will measure 12½ kilometres from east to west, and 5 kilometres from north to south. So the land for the priests and for the Levites will be 12½ kilometres from east to west and 10 kilometres from north to south.
korean_text: 제사장의 경계선을 따라 레위 사람의 몫을 주되 길이는 이만 오천 척이요 너비는 만 척으로 할지니 이 구역의 길이가 이만 오천 척이요 너비가 각기 만 척이라

sentences.original_text: The Levites will also have a special part
sentences.korean_translation: 레위 사람들도 특별한 구역을 가질 것입니다

sentences.original_text: south of the part for the priests
It will be the same size
It will measure 12½ kilometres from east to west
and 5 kilometres from north to south
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 남북으로 5 킬로미터의 너비를 가질 것입니다

sentences.original_text: So the land for the priests and for the Levites
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 제사장들과 레위 사람들을 위한 땅은

sentences.original_text: will be 12½ kilometres from east to west
and 10 kilometres from north to south
